location: American Indian Student Center. 1250 North Bellflower Boulevard Long Beach, CA 90840.
description: Designed by Ric Danay and created by Art Neri and Sylvia Montana. Nature's interconnectedness is celebrated in this American Indian story inspired by nyth and spirituality. The thunderbird links a central kachina mask design with traditional symbols of the southwestern desert-earth, corn, sun, storm clouds, and rain. Photo © Ian Robertson-Salt.
